WorkItem.Description:
There needs to be a case added for `c:base64Binary` in `getTypedValue`.

This type is used for `ImageEntity`, the new record image field for CRM 2013.

Currently this error is thrown: `Uncaught Error: Unhandled field type: "c:base64Binary", please report the problem to the developer.`

Comments.Message:
Hi, 

Thanks for reaching out. 

How would you like to use entityimage field in JavaScript? When you try to extract data from entityimage field, what you get from CRM is a byte array, I am not exactly sure how it can be used in JavaScript. 

Thanks,
Daniel Cai

I would create an `` element with it and attach it to the DOM. https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/window.btoa http://stackoverflow.com/questions/11524268/atob-not-working-in-ie http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1207190/embedding-base64-images
